metadata.description: Common behavioral questions for all roles

questions.question: Tell me about a time when you faced a significant challenge at work. How did you handle it?
hints: Use the STAR method (Situation, Task, Action, Result)
followUp: What would you do differently if faced with a similar situation?
What did you learn from this experience?

questions.question: Describe a situation where you had to work with a difficult team member. How did you handle it?
followUp: How did it affect team dynamics?

questions.question: Tell me about a time when you had to meet a tight deadline. How did you prioritize your work?
hints: Mention any tools or frameworks you used

questions.question: Describe a project you're particularly proud of. What was your role and what made it successful?
followUp: What did you learn from this project?

questions.question: Tell me about a time when you made a mistake. How did you handle it?
followUp: How did you prevent similar mistakes in the future?

questions.question: Describe a situation where you had to persuade others to see things your way. What approach did you take?
hints: Discuss your communication and influence strategies

questions.question: Tell me about a time when you had to adapt to a significant change at work. How did you manage it?
followUp: What was the most difficult part?
How did you help others adapt?

questions.question: Describe a time when you went above and beyond your job responsibilities. What motivated you?
hints: Explain the impact of your extra effort

questions.question: Tell me about a time when you received critical feedback. How did you respond?
followUp: How did this feedback help you grow?
Do you actively seek feedback now?

questions.question: Describe a situation where you had to make a difficult decision with incomplete information. What was your approach?
